/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The street itself is devoid of any traffic or pedestrians, giving it a serene and peaceful ambiance.
